structure.unit: Courts, Judicial Officers And Proceedings In Civil Cases

law.catch_line: Uniform Practices; Forms; Superintendence Of Record Keeping
law.text: The chief justice shall be authorized to require uniform practices, to prescribe forms of blanks and records, and to superintend the keeping of records by clerks. He may authorize any justice or special justice to hold a session of any division at another division or elsewhere, in order to promote the speedy dispatch of the courtâ€™s business.
